nodes.text: Atrian Merchants' Causeway was a hyperlane existing sometime around the Imperial Era. Pirate queen Gunda Mabin travelled to its busiest stretch in hopes of saving her flagship Bloody Bones from exploding due to a coaxium leak.
Atrian Merchants' Causeway was first mentioned in Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, a reference book written by Daniel Wallace and released in 2018.
